title: [BUG] Encode with SKEncodedImageFormat.Webp on Android produce grayscale images
body:
Image convertion from jpeg to webp produce grayscale image.

var d = SKBitmap.Decode(stream).Encode(SKEncodedImageFormat.Webp, 65);

Expected Behavior: color image
Actual Behavior: grayscale image

Problem in Encode() method.
Works fine on IOS and Android-Emulator, doesn't work (grayscale) on bunch of hardware Android phones.

- Version with issue:  2.80.2
- Last known good version:  1.68.3
- IDE:  Visual Studio 2019 preview
- Platform Target Frameworks
  - Android: 9.0
- Target Devices:  Xiaomi Mi5 and Mi9
